name: Kill Yourself - TOJam12
description:
Kill Yourself is a puzzle platformer game where you have only one ability. To kill yourself. Climb to the goal atop a mountain of your own corpses!

Kill Yourself was developed over one crazy weekend at TOJam 12: What Twelves Below.

Features:

  • Humorous suicide
  • Nine levels
  • Mad science
  • Support for X-Box gamepad and keyboard
  • Some bugs. Can you find them?

Keyboard Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Space - Start game/Kill yourself
  • R key - Reset level
  • ESC - Quit game

X-Box controls:

  • Left stick - Move
  • A button - Start game/Kill yourself
  • B button - Quit game

Credits:

  • Dan Soeder - Programming, Animation, Art
  • Steve 'Tofski' Kun - Programming, Music, Sound Effects
  • Eli 'Elieliz' Carmona - Art
